description.name: Object Model Template Transformation Update Site

site.description: OMTT is language designed for transformation of structured object data into textual formats, for example XML. OMTT templates run in Java Platform and may be used in JVM-based languages.

category-def.name: pl.omtt.eclipse.category
category-def.label: OMTT (alpha version)
category-def.description: Object Model Transformation Templates - alpha packages
